rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall designed for natural light with floor-to-ceiling windows that open to the landscaped front garden.

An integrated eco-friendly living and kitchen space featuring energy-efficient appliances, natural materials, and ample storage. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side for morning sunlight as per Vastu principles.
A multipurpose dining area that can be used for formal dining or casual gatherings, with built-in seating and natural lighting.
An open-plan studio space serving as a living room, study, and relaxation zone. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side for balanced light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu.

openings.description: Eco-friendly reinforced glass door with automated security features.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living kitchen area to allow ample morning light and air circulation.
Large floor-to-ceiling window in the open plan studio for enhanced natural lighting and ventilation.
Private access to a swimming pool from the studio area, designed with eco-friendly water recycling systems and integrated landscaping for sustainability.
